anya-e0605n22:7_0: Datvāna maṁsaṁ rajjaṁ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n22:16_0: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṁ imaṁ,
anya-e0605n22:22_0: Cakkāvudhaṁ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n22:25_0: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n22:26_0: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṁ tava.
anya-e0605n22:29_0: Pitā vudikkhi taṁ māraṁ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n22:31_0: Tadā so asambhivācaṁ sīhanādaṁ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n22:32_0: Na jānāti sayaṁ mayhaṁ dāsabhāvapiyaṁ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n22:34_0: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n22:44_0: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n22:49_0: Nāhaṁ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n22:53_0: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṁ bahuṁ.
anya-e0605n22:55_0: Samantā dhajinaṁ disvā yuddhaṁ māraṁ savāhanaṁ,
anya-e0605n22:56_0: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṁ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n22:58_0: Yante taṁ nappasahati senaṁ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n22:59_0: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṁ pattaṁ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n22:61_0: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n22:65_0: Atthi thāmaṁ balaṁ mayhaṁ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n22:68_0: Mayhaṁ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n22:71_0: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṁ mahī.
anya-e0605n22:73_0: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṁ bāhuṁ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n22:77_0: Tasmiṁ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
